name: Axe of the Chromatic Queen
I0D: The Greataxe has been in the care of Lord de'Arnise for some time, a relic of his adventuring youth. It has been kept disassembled, the individual pieces stored in separate locations, and only used in the direst of emergencies. Lord de'Arnise was likely concerned about the powerful magic that the weapon radiated when compiled, and rightfully so. A trail of destruction has followed it through history, leading straight back to the original owners. A gift from the dwarven god Moradin during the Crown Wars, it is not to be messed with.
I1D: The Axe was reforged for you by Cespenar, an incredibly gifted smith, who specialises in the restoration of legendary artifacts. Cespenar has also left room for the blade to be further modified in the future, you need only find the parts and bring it back to Cespenar to be reforged.
I2D: You receive a +2 bonus to Attack rolls you make when attacking with this battleaxe.
I3D:
On a successful hit you may choose to deal 1d4+1 extra damage. You may choose to have the damage type be
Lightning, Acid, Poison, Fire or Cold damage. You can use this feature once per turn.
